text: Lieutenant-Colonel Geoffrey Charles Tasker Keyes, VC, MC (18 May 1917 â€“ 18 November 1941) was an Scottish recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces. At the time he was the youngest lieutenant colonel in the British Army. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:1941 deaths Category:British Army people
title: Geoffrey Charles Tasker Keyes
